summary: "Hot to Go!" is a song by Chappell Roan from her debut album. Released in 2023, it's a synth-pop track about a woman wanting to have sex with another woman. The song was inspired by Roan's childhood dream of being a cheerleader. It became popular for its catchy tune and bold message, reaching high ranks on music charts in the US, UK, Ireland, Australia, New Zealand, and Canada. Many praised it for challenging norms in the music industry.
title: Hot to Go!
